Title: Prohibits landlords, lessors, sub-lessors and grantors from demanding brokers' fees from a tenant
Summary: Prohibits landlords, lessors, sub-lessors and grantors from demanding broker's fees from a tenant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting landlords, lessors, sub-lessors and grantors from demanding brokers' fees from a tenant
